channel.title: blockchain on Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in blockchain on Hugo

item.title: Blockchain use cases
item.description: Trust Over IP: Hyperledger Ursa, Indy, and Aires https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FfuhlF9ZYPM Notes prove the credential without CA trusted issuer (eg: gov) issues the identity token (eg: driving license) -> send it to a crypto account (like sending btc to someone) on the blockchain, it shows a record that the account owns that license. (like you can check your btc balance / NFS on chain explorer) anyone can request that you own that account (like an approval transaction from dapp).
